pages.text:
Events
Get Together
The Perfect Place for Events
Offering so much more than Poker, the Bonita Springs Poker Room is a hidden gem for events. Our building and grounds provide a perfect place for corporate dinners, family reunions, birthday parties and bachelor/bachelorette parties.
We can provide an excellent package for your get-together. Enjoy an excellent menu at the most unique venue for your event. Groups ranging from 10 to 100 people can be accommodated. Options include our new party room, the on-site Brass Tap restaurant, the Sports & Wagering Room and even the Poker Room itself.
Plus, our parking lot is also available for rent for corporate events, motorcycle classes, auto dealer weekend events, circuses, etc.
We also host several events throughout the year, including programs for the biggest races of the year like the Kentucky Derby and Breedersâ€™ Cup. Join us!
Book your next event at the Bonita Springs Poker Room
We invite you to check out our facility for your next birthday party, family reunion or bachelor/bachelorette party. We can also help with corporate events and outdoor rental space. Contact us at
(239) 992-2411
to get started.
